objects.text:
• Premium Milk Thistle Extract
• Supports Liver Function
• Natural Detoxification
• Clinically Studied Formula

product_details.description: LIVER CLEANSE, DETOX & REPAIR : Detox supplement capsule, liver aid for alcohol detox is a liver cleanse formula. This liver aid supplement contains milk thistle extract. Milk thistle helps support and repair for active liver health and function.* LIVER SUPPORT SUPPLEMENT WITH MILK THISTLE, TUMERIC & ARTICHOKE EXTRACTS: A fatty liver supplement, liver and kidney cleanse detox* Milk Thistle liver detox formula made to support & aid liver health. Detox cleanse. liver supplements for men & women. LIVER HEALTH SUPPLEMENTS FOR MEN & WOMEN: For indigestion & bloating relief, cramping, flatulence and indigestion.* Liver pills support liver repair, plus support liver cleanse detox & repair fatty liver* Kidney cleanse detox & repair formula. ANTIOXIDANT RICH ARTICHOKE EXTRACT LIVER HEALTH FORMULA: This detox and digestive aid pill with milk thistle and turmeric. These are two ingredients with antioxidant properties that help reduce potential free radical damage.* 2 LIVER SUPPLEMENT PILLS DAILY FOR LIVER HEALTH: Take 2 Liver tablets supplements daily during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional. Made in GMP-certified and FDA-registered facilities. Brand - Swisse ** Item Form - Tablet ** Manufacturer - Swisse Wellness, Inc. ** Item Package Quantity - 1 ** Package Information - Bottle **

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a liver detox supplement with a bold and clean design. The background is a diagonal split of deep forest green and light herbal green gradients, adding a natural and organic appeal. A large product image is positioned prominently on the right, with three floating capsules enhancing the visual focus. Key promotional text layers include a bold heading ("heading") in white, a supportive subheading ("subheading") in light green, a fine dividing line ("decorative"), a list of product benefits ("description") in white, and a highly visible price point ("price") in pastel green. A call-to-action button background ("cta_background") with accompanying text ("cta") draws users to interact. 

**Color Palette:**
- Forest Green: `#1D3D1D`
- Herbal Green: `#A7D489`
- Light Leaf Green: `#8CB369`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image uses a clean and modern color palette centered around shades of green, white, black, and red to convey health, freshness, and credibility. The vibrant lime green (#A2D616) is prominent on the cap and label, highlighting vitality and detox themes. White (#FFFFFF) forms the base, offering a clean and clinical appeal, while black (#000000) text ensures optimal contrast and readability. The logo uses red (#D52A2A) and black, creating strong visual branding and urgency. Grey (#A4A9AD) blends in for certification elements, subtly assuring quality. These colors blend smoothly yet maintain distinction, making the overall design eye-catching and trustworthy.
